text: ‘Ara tomara yake allah‌ra sarika kara ami take kirupe bhaya karaba? Athaca tomara bhaya karacha na ye, tomara allah‌ra sathe sarika karacha emana kichu,yara pakse tini tomadera kache kono pramana nayila karena ni. Kaje'i yadi tomara jana tabe bala, du‘dalera madhye kona dala nirapatta labhera besi hakadara.’
